channel.title: Creative Innovation on Brian Danin
channel.description: Recent content in Creative Innovation on Brian Danin

item.title: Web Systems
item.description:
Professional open source web development solutions tailored to any business needs.

Providing professional solutions for web applications for over 15 years as an expert in Drupal, WordPress, and other open source platforms. With a focus on front-end, JavaScript, HTML, PHP, Google Tag Manager (GTM), and other core web technologies. Committed to providing the best quality solutions that are tailored to meet the needs of any business.

As technology continues to evolve, it can be difficult to keep track of all the new web technologies out there. Fortunately, there are a few key steps businesses can take to ensure their digital marketing efforts are on point. Having a website that is regularly updated and optimized for search engines will help increase visibility and attract more customers.

item.title: SnowSports
item.description:
Brian has ski and snowboard certifications from PSIA - AASI Professional Ski and Snowboard Instructors of America, and is a professional ski and snowboard teacher for students of all levels.

Whether you have never been on the snow before or you are an advanced rider, let’s connect.

Please contact me for more information or to book a a private lesson today!
